title: Dear Riot.  Please start the jungler with smite and flash as summoner spells.
body:
Dear Riot.  Please start the jungler with smite and flash as summoner spells.  I know this is kinda like a retard fail move on the junglers part.  But please help me help them by never letting them forget it unless they swap roles then well fuck me.

Edit:  I am not saying force them to play smite flash.  I am saying during the camp select portion auto start them with smite flash because 90% of junglers use it.  If you want to swap flash for ignite or ghost fine.  But that way when they forget to swap spells you at the very least have smite.  I only said flash in addition because it is the second most common spell to use as jungler.  I am not even saying force the guy who picked jungle to use smite because you can lane swap just start there screen with it.

replies.body:
Starting them with those at the start of the queue wouldnt be so bad, especially with an option in the settings for what keys to set them on.

Heck, just make a setting for all of the roles to set you up with whatever you want, then make it so that you can turn it off if players want.
Yes please if i can have my spells set up by position would be nice
This would be a great idea and is basically the point I was getting at.  It gets old when the Jungle for gets smite and it is a 4v5 unless you can manage to drag the game out to 50 mins+.

I'd prefer a pop up message or something letting you know you don't have smite enabled, probably when the last 30-second countdown timer begins, at least that way you can dismiss it if you are doing some pro (bronze) strats or switched with someone else, but can save yourself 20 minutes of misery in case it wasn't indended.
I like ignite on El Shaco
